protocol.title: The 8-Phase Remnant Protocol
protocol.summaryMd:
Listen → Confirm → Cut → Anchor → Move → Establish → Guard → Shine

A repeatable formation loop (personal, family, house-church, or team). Each phase includes aim, Scripture (ESV), practices, signs, and common traps.
protocol.declarationMd:
Father, I quiet myself to hear You.
I test every spirit by Your Word.
I cut off distractions and false ties.
I anchor deep in truth and covenant.
I move in obedience with courage.
I establish altars and righteous rhythm.
I guard what You’ve planted with vigilance.
And I shine—bold, humble, and faithful—reflecting Jesus. Amen.

usageModes.name: Personal Daily (10–20 min)

steps.title: Listen
steps.stepsMd: 10–20 minutes silence + journal: “What are You saying? What am I avoiding?”

steps.title: Anchor
steps.stepsMd: Anchor in one passage and one obedience.

usageModes.notesMd: If you’re confused → return to Listen. If you’re stuck → execute Cut + Move. If you’re unstable → strengthen Anchor.

usageModes.name: Weekly House-Church / Team Rhythm (60–90 min)
usageModes.notesMd: Keep it simple, reproducible, and obedient.

phases.title: Listen
phases.aimMd: Stillness that restores signal. God speaks; we stop competing with noise.

practices.title: Silence + journal
practices.stepsMd: “What are You saying? What am I avoiding?”

phases.title: Confirm
phases.aimMd: Discernment before movement. Witness before action.

practices.title: One sentence instruction
practices.stepsMd: Write it in one sentence; test it against Scripture.

practices.title: Fruit test
practices.stepsMd: Does this produce repentance, humility, and fruit?

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: It holds up under time, prayer, and counsel.

phases.title: Cut
phases.aimMd: Sever what feeds Babylon in you—ties, habits, pipelines, dependencies.

practices.title: Delete/disable access points
practices.stepsMd: Apps, subscriptions, routines, relationships (as patterns and pipelines).

phases.title: Anchor
phases.aimMd: Covenant depth. Truth planted deep enough to survive pressure.

practices.title: Core anchors
practices.stepsMd: Choose: 3 Scriptures + 1 rule of life + 1 daily prayer rhythm.

practices.title: Truth Protocol
practices.stepsMd: What I believe / what I refuse / what I obey.

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Stability under stress; quick repentance; steady joy.

phases.title: Move
phases.aimMd: Obedience with feet. Shift intentionally: physical, financial, relational.

practices.title: Write the move
practices.stepsMd: Where, when, cost, first step, accountability.

practices.title: Budget alignment
practices.stepsMd: Cut leaks, build runway, fund obedience.

practices.title: Relational alignment
practices.stepsMd: Clarify who’s coming with you and who isn’t.

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Momentum + provision + increasing clarity while moving.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Waiting for certainty God only gives in motion.

phases.title: Establish
phases.aimMd: Build altar + rhythm + territory. Name the assignment.

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Order replaces chaos; consistency replaces intensity.

commonTraps.label: Trap
commonTraps.bodyMd: Building a brand instead of an altar.

phases.title: Guard
phases.aimMd: Protect what was planted. Warfare is mostly maintenance and discernment.

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: Fewer ambushes; faster recovery; stronger discernment.

phases.title: Shine
phases.aimMd: Output. Witness. Training others. Reflection of the King in public.

practices.title: Build multiplication
practices.stepsMd: I do, you watch → we do together → you do, I watch.

signsOfAlignment.label: Aligned
signsOfAlignment.bodyMd: People strengthen around you; truth spreads; fruit remains.

diagnostics.descriptionMd: Return to Listen: restore signal before action.
Deepen Confirm: test instruction under Scripture, time, and counsel.
Execute Cut + Move: remove drag and take the next step.
Strengthen Anchor: deepen truth and rhythm before pressure increases.
Reinforce Guard: boundaries, armor, and fast recovery.
Step into Shine: witness and train others, without performing.
